Deprecated List

Member Packet::length
You should use bitSize inplace.

Member RakNetGetTime (void)
You should better use RakNet::GetTime(). It require the definition of the RAKNET_COMPATIBILITY preprocessor symbol during the compilation of RakNet to be available.
